title:
why is there a 3\' alligator in the retention pond behind sam\'s store?

my husband and I took photos of it the other day. I thought only turtles lived there.

thanks
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=10131



By the way, could you share one of the photos you took? I'd like to
post it with this answer if you wouldn't mind. We'll give you
credit. Just e-mail it to jim.ware@starnewsonline.com.
